name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DMS FAST DELIST - DMS EXTENSION SERIES

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will simplify the delisting for proof point and Cloudmark

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will simplify the delisting for proof point and Cloudmark

1 - Fill the fields given in the popup 
2 - click save
3 - go to deploy , you will find two added buttons on top of the ips area (Delist cloudmark - delist proofpoint)
4 - select the ips you need to delist 

Then if you clicked on one of the buttons  the extension will automatically open tabs as much as the number of the selected ips (means if you selected 5 ips it will open 5 tabs) each tab will open the link of the blacklist provider and fill the inputs with the appropriate values 

you will  only pass the captcha and done

you can see the pictures for more clarifications
